name: SecureBlog v1.0.0 - Production Ready
body:
## 🎉 First Stable Release

### ✅ Complete Security Implementation
- Zero JavaScript architecture
- Plugin-based extensibility
- Comprehensive test suite
- Full documentation
- Beginner-friendly setup

### 📦 Features
- **Ultra-secure**: No JS, no cookies, no tracking
- **Fast**: Pure static HTML
- **Extensible**: Plugin architecture
- **Tested**: Unit tests + security audits
- **Documented**: Complete guides for all skill levels

### 🔒 Security
- Content Security Policy enforcement
- SHA-256 integrity hashing
- Signed manifests
- Supply chain security
- Automated security regression testing

### 📚 Documentation
- [Beginner Guide](docs/BEGINNER-GUIDE.md)
- [Plugin Development](docs/PLUGIN-GUIDE.md)
- [Security Audit](docs/SECURITY-AUDIT.md)
- [Deployment Guide](DEPLOY.md)

### 🚀 Quick Start
```bash
git clone https://github.com/techmad220/secureblog.git
cd secureblog
go run cmd/main_v2.go
```

### 🙏 Thanks
Thanks to the community for the thorough review and feedback!
